alert.note: Alert for Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 24 at 4:16PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN WASHINGTON AND NORTHEASTERN ADAIR COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM CDT... At 416 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Cincinnati, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Farmington... Prairie Grove... West Fork... Lincoln... Westville... Greenland... Watts... Cincinnati... Johnson... Prairie Grove Battlefield State... Walnut Grove... Savoy... Ballard... Wedington... Rhea... Canehill... Hogeye... Summers... Wheeler... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 50 and 66, and between mile markers 68 and 69. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
